com.qwertovsky.mailer

Class Sender

  • Object
    • Sender

  • public class Sender
extends Object
    Sends messages.
    Contains setting for connect to mail server: server host, server port, user, password.

    For example:

     //simple text message
 Hello, $name.
 Introduces a new tariff plan $tariff.
     //and code
 MessageContent message = new MessageContent(new File("message.eml"));
 message.setAddressFrom("Company", "sender@company.com", "utf-8");
 message.setSubject("New tariff $tariff");
 
 //parameters same for all recipients
 String[] parametersHeaders = new String[]{"tariff"};
 String[] parameters = new String[]{"Super 146"};
 message.setParameters(parametersHeaders, parameters);
 message.addAttachment(new File("super146.pdf"));
 
 //person parameters
 parametersHeaders = new String[]{"email1", "name"};
 List personParameters = new ArrayList();
 personParameters.add(new String[]{"abon16545@gmail.com", "John Doe"});
 personParameters.add(new String[]{"abon2111@gmail.com", "Mr.X"});
 Sender sender = new Sender("smtp.company.com", 25, "login", "password", "Company");
 sender.send(message, parametersHeaders, personParameters);
    Author:
    Qwertovsky

      • Sender

        public Sender(String smtpHostName,
      int smtpPort,
      String smtpUser,
      String smtpPassword,
      String hostname)
       throws QwertoMailerException,
              Exception
        Create Sender class
        Parameters:
        smtpHostName - SMTP server
        smtpPort - SMTP server port (default 25)
        smtpUser - SMTP server account
        smtpPassword - SMTP server password
        hostname - local machine name
        Throws:
        QwertoMailerException - SMTP server is not specified (NULL or empty)
        Exception

      • send

        public void send(MessageContent messageContent,
        Set<InternetAddress> emailsTo,
        boolean haltOnFailure)
          throws QwertoMailerException,
                 Exception
        Send personal messages to recipients
        New message for each address
        If haltOnFailure is true and bad emails present , throw QwertoMailerException. Default value of haltOnFailure is false.
        Parameters:
        messageContent - message content
        emailsTo - list of recipients
        haltOnFailure -
        Throws:
        QwertoMailerException - Message is null , From email has not been specified , Recipients list is empty , Halt on failure (bad emails present)
        Exception
        See Also:
        send(MessageContent, List)

      • send

        public void send(MessageContent messageContent,
        String[] personParamHeaders,
        List<String[]> personParameters)
          throws QwertoMailerException,
                 Exception
        Send messages. One array of parameters - one message.
        Headers must contain "email*". Headers may contain "person" and "attach*".
        Header "person" is a part of address (Person <Email>). One "person" header applies for all "email*".
        One message for parameters array. If array contains more than one addresses , will be created one message with several addresses in field TO:
        Parameters:
        messageContent - message content
        personParamHeaders - headers of parameters
        personParameters - list of parameters
        Throws:
        QwertoMailerException - Message is null , From email has not been specified , Recipients list is empty
        Exception
        See Also:
        send(MessageContent, String[], List, boolean)

      • send

        public void send(MessageContent messageContent,
        String[] personParamHeaders,
        List<String[]> personParameters,
        boolean haltOnFailure)
          throws QwertoMailerException,
                 Exception
        Send messages. One array of parameters - one message.
        Headers must contain "email*". Headers may contain "person" and "attach*".
        Header "person" is a part of address (Person <Email>). One "person" header applies for all "email*".
        One message for parameters array. If array contains more than one addresses , will be created one message with several addresses in field TO:
        If haltOnFailure is true and bad emails present or bad parameters present , throw QwertoMailerException. Default value of haltOnFailure is false.
        Parameters:
        messageContent - message content
        personParamHeaders - headers of parameters
        personParameters - list of parameters
        haltOnFailure -
        Throws:
        QwertoMailerException - Message is null , From email has not been specified , Recipients list is empty , Emails not present in file , Halt on failure (bad emails present)
        Exception
        See Also:
        send(MessageContent, String[], List)

        Parameters:
        messageContent - message content
        personParameters - list of parameters map
        Throws:
        QwertoMailerException - Message is null , From email has not been specified , Recipients list is empty , Emails not present in file
        Exception

      • send

        public void send(MessageContent messageContent,
        List<Map<String,String>> personParameters,
        boolean haltOnFailure)
          throws QwertoMailerException,
                 Exception
        Send messages. One array of parameters - one message.
        Headers must contain "email*". Headers may contain "person" and "attach*".
        Header "person" is a part of address (Person <Email>). One "person" header applies for all "email*".
        One message for parameters array. If array contains more than one addresses , will be created one message with several addresses in field TO:
        If haltOnFailure is true and bad emails present or bad parameters present , throw QwertoMailerException. Default value of haltOnFailure is false.
        Parameters:
        messageContent - message content
        personParameters - list of parameters map
        haltOnFailure -
        Throws:
        QwertoMailerException - Message is null , From email has not been specified , Recipients list is empty , Emails not present in file , Halt on failure (bad emails present)
        Exception
